name: Crazy Alchemist
description: * special note: this game also supports PC and VR two platforms,you can play it in pc without VR . Crazy Alchemist is a simulation game full of medieval fantasy and magic. Have your own alchemy studio, using a variety of novel raw materials to refine the amazing alchemy products.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: PC:i3   VR:i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: PC:GTX570   VR:1050TI Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
